slides.title: AI Model Comparison Framework
slides.subtitle: The 3-Dimension Decision System for Product Leaders
slides.visual_style: Title card, bold sans-serif typography, minimal geometric accents, dark background

slides.title: Dimension 1: Control vs Speed
slides.content:
High Control:
• Claude 4.5
• Granular reasoning
• Best for: Complex systems, debugging

High Speed:
• GPT-5
• Unified reasoning
• Best for: Rapid prototyping, iteration
slides.visual_style: 2x2 quadrant matrix, model names positioned, arrows showing tradeoff axis

slides.title: Dimension 2: Cost Structure
slides.content:
GPT-5: $0.03/1K tokens
Claude Sonnet 4.5: $0.05/1K
Claude Haiku 4.5: $0.015/1K ⭐
Gemini 2.5 Pro: $0.07/1K
slides.visual_style: Horizontal bar chart, Haiku highlighted as best value, $ symbols, clean data viz

slides.title: Dimension 3: Context Windows
slides.content:
Gemini 2.5 Pro: 1M tokens
Claude 4.5: 1M tokens
GPT-5: 200K tokens
slides.visual_style: Size comparison visualization, stacked bars or circles showing relative capacity

slides.title: Your Decision Matrix
slides.content:
Rapid iteration + multi-modal → GPT-5
Deep reasoning + coding → Claude 4.5
Cost efficiency + speed → Claude Haiku 4.5
Enterprise integration → Gemini 2.5 Pro

Most teams need TWO models:
• Fast model for prototyping
• Powerful model for production
slides.visual_style: Flow chart or decision tree, arrows pointing to recommendations, clean modern layout

platform_specs.style_guidance: Professional tech aesthetic. Dark mode. Minimal text per slide. Data visualization focus. San-serif fonts. Clean geometric layouts. Monochrome with single accent color (electric blue or green). Corporate-friendly but modern.
